title: Add uploaded service photos throughout the website

requirements.text: Display the uploaded photos of the technician performing chip-level repairs (images showing workbench with motherboards, soldering equipment, and open desktop computer) in the Hardware Repairs section of the Services component
acceptanceCriteria: The Hardware Repairs service card displays one or more of the uploaded chip-level repair photos
Images are properly sized and maintain their aspect ratio
Photos enhance the visual representation of the chip-level repair service offering

requirements.text: Display the uploaded photos of the technician working with server rack and network cabling (images showing professional network infrastructure setup with blue and yellow cables) in the Networking section of the Services component
acceptanceCriteria: The Networking service card displays one or more of the uploaded networking infrastructure photos
Images showcase professional LAN cabling and server configuration capabilities
Photos are integrated seamlessly within the existing card design

requirements.text: Display the uploaded photos of the technician performing data recovery work (images showing hard drives being examined at the workbench with specialized equipment) in the Data Recovery section of the Services component
acceptanceCriteria: The Data Recovery service card displays one or more of the uploaded hard drive recovery photos
Images demonstrate professional data recovery capabilities and equipment
Photos maintain consistency with other service section imagery

requirements.text: Integrate the uploaded service photos throughout the website as static assets, storing them in frontend/public/assets/generated and ensuring they load efficiently across all sections
acceptanceCriteria: All 12 uploaded images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are optimized for web display without quality loss
Photo integration maintains the existing responsive design patterns
Images load efficiently and do not impact page performance

constraints: Use the exact uploaded image files without modification to source content
Maintain the current service section card layout and structure
Ensure images are responsive and work across mobile and desktop viewports
nonGoals: Creating an image gallery or lightbox functionality
Adding captions or descriptions to the photos
Creating new service sections beyond the existing ones
